items.summary: In `backend/main.mo`, add the missing internal Motoko type definitions for organization-scoped wallet domain entities (wallets, wallet transactions, and wallet events). The types must be Candid-friendly and follow the same explicit, canonical style as existing types (e.g., `Organization`, `Order`, CRM/HRMS records). Ensure the new wallet-related types include `organizationId : OrganizationId` so they can support multi-tenant isolation in later steps.
